data.message: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle, this is the company that opposes bottle deposit schemes

replies.message: Hi David, we’ve been involved in the design and running of deposit return systems around the world and so we have a lot of experience of how the system works.  It is true that we’ve expressed concerns about deposit return schemes in the past. Whilst some concerns remain, what’s clear is that recycling rates have stalled and there’s a need to address the issue of recycling and on-the-go littering and we believe we should try something different.
"Expressed concerns", I believe that coca cola pledged to "fight back" against European bottle deposit schemes, or am I wrong?

These things (bottle deposit schemes) have been run successfully for decades with plenty of data about how they work, coca colas (very) recent change of heart - although welcome - is a reaction to public opinion

It's good when organisations react to public opinion like this but we cannot let them use advertising budgets to pretend that they stand at the vanguard of environmentalism when they've been an enemy for so long
